SignalFlag.NAME: Signal Flag
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play 3 attacks in a turn, gain 1 Fuel.

Funnel.NAME: Funnel
Funnel.FLAVOR: Refuel your tools without spilling a single drop.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you gain Fuel, gain 1 additional Fuel.

ExhaustVents.NAME: Exhaust Vent
ExhaustVents.FLAVOR: Point the opening in the direction of your enemies.

PolishingWheel.NAME: Polishing Wheel
PolishingWheel.FLAVOR: Polishes even your throw-away creations to a mirror shine.
